  • Used deep reinforcement learning method along with Monte Carlo Tree Search to achieve the task.

Projects

Beer Recommendation System

  • Built neighborhood based and model based collaborative filtering algorithms for beer recommendation.
  • Developed a Content based recommendation system using NLP on beer review-text.
  • Tackled recommendation concerns such as cold- start, variety, serendipity and accuracy.
  • Developed the project in python using surprise, NL toolkit and scikit-learn packages.

Linked Data Crawler

  • Built a data crawler that crawls the data distributed across the Linked Open Data cloud.
  • Developed de-duplication modules to save the memory used.
  • Technologies Used: Java, RDF, MongoDB, Sparql.

Injection Molding Machine Simulator

  • Built an Injection Molding Machine(IMM) simulator that simulated the pressure, current, and pressure inside the machine while molding plastic objects.
  • Built an ML module for anomaly detection of the IMM machine parameters.
  • Technologies used: Python, Raspberry Pi, Kafka, MQTT, Elasticsearch, Kibana, CBLOF.

Bluetooth Remote Control for PC Using Java Mobile

  • Developed a mobile application that can be used to input to the PC like standard keyboard and mouse.
  • Built an ML module for anomaly detection of the IMM machine parameters.
  • Technologies used: Java, J2ME.
